TextView.android:text: REVIEW THE ROSTER AND ASK TO SPEAK WITH THE MOTHER OR PRIMARY CAREGIVER OF EACH CHILD UNDER THE AGE OF 5 (INCLUDING NEWBORNS). NOTE THAT THE MOTHER OR PRIMARY CAREGIVER IS THE IDEAL RESPONDENT FOR MODULES B, C, AND M). A LOOP OR MULTIPLE COPIES OF THIS MODULE MAY NEED TO BE CREATED SO THAT INFORMATION FOR THE MOTHER OR PRIMARY CAREGIVER OF EACH CHILD UNDER THE AGE OF 5 CAN BE COLLECTED AS NEEDED. IF A CHILD’S MOTHER/PRIMARY CAREGIVER IS NOT AVAILABLE AND AN APPOINTMENT CAN’T BE SCHDULED, ANOTHER ADULT HOUSEHOLD MEMBER MAY ANSWER AS PROXY.

INTERVIEWER: I would like to speak with the mother or primary caregiver of child/[name]. If you are the primary caregiver of child/[name], please allow me to ask you about yourself in detail.\nIf the mother or primary caregiver of child/[name] is not available, when would be a better time return to speak with her? \nRECORD THE RETURN DATE (dd/mm/yyyy) AND RETURN TIME AM/PM If it is not possible to meet now or in the future with the mother or primary caregiver, then I may I please speak with another adult household member to ask questions about the primary caregiver of child/[name]?
Is caregiver member of this household?
Are you the primary caregiver of the child/[name]?
Who is the primary caregiver of the child/[name]?
What is your relationship to the child/[name]? (GIVE ONE RESPONSE, OR WRITE RESPONSE FOR 88)
Which religious group does the primary caregiver belong to? IF MORE THAN ONE, MARK OTHER AND SPECIFY
Which ethnic group does the primary caregiver belong to? IF MORE THAN ONE, MARK OTHER AND SPECIFY (GIVE RESPONSE ON THE BLANK)
What level of education have completed?
How many years of education has the primary caregiver completed? - Don't know/Refused to respond
What is the employment status of the primary caregiver?\n(CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE, OR WRITE RESPONSE FOR 88) ONLY INCLUDE THIS QUESTION IF OCCUPATION IS NOT ASKED AS PART OF THE HOUSEHOLD ROSTER
What is the main occupation of the primary caregiver?\nMain occupation being the most important income-generating activity (CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE, OR WRITE RESPONSE FOR 88)
